channel.title: Redemption UA add to archived unearthed arcana

item.title: Redemption UA add to archived unearthed arcana
item.content:encoded:
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/paladin:redemption-ua

Heres a link to the UA version of redemption paladin, which I added a link to due to it being different enough from book version to warrant such. If someone has free time with front page access, feel free to add it there to the Archived UA section

Thanks
